gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) UHD Graphics 620 (Kabylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Game appears to run fine, except no input is read. Launcher detects keyboard and joypad, however changes are never saved. It appears that the game is unable to read or write to the config file joy1.ini. Will report after further testing.
title: Pharaoh Rebirth+
